home.welcome_message: Hi, Welcome to my personal website
home.developer_intro: Mohamed Aziz Chouchi, Full Stack Developer
home.passionate_description: Passionate about creating seamless user experiences, I'm Aziz Chouchi, a Full Stack developer based in Tunisia. With a knack for problem-solving and a commitment to delivering high-quality work, I thrive on tackling complex challenges and crafting awesome interfaces with a focus on UI/UX measures.
home.web_dev_description: Design and development of modern and interactive websites. Proficiency in both back-end and front-end development.
home.ux_ui_description: Designing exceptional user interfaces and optimizing the user experience.
home.database_description: Design and optimization of databases to store and retrieve information efficiently.
home.devops_description: Implementation of DevOps practices to enhance collaboration between development and operations teams, automate processes, and ensure continuous delivery.
home.exp1_company: MEFTAHI Informatique 路 Feb 2015 - Present 路 Bellevue, Tunis
home.exp1_description: PC repair, network cabling, sound manipulation, image editing, video editing, inventory management, and annual report creation.
home.exp1_skills: Skills : Maintenance and Repair, IT, Microsoft Office
home.exp2_company: Practical DevOps Project at ESPRIT 路 Sep 2023 - Nov 2023
home.exp2_description: Led a practical DevOps project, implementing Jenkins, Docker, Git, Nexus, JUnit, Sonar, Docker Compose, Grafana, Prometheus, etc.
home.exp2_skills: Skills : GitHub, Jenkins, Docker, Git, Nexus, CI/CD, JUnit, DevOps, Teamwork
home.exp3_company: Academic Project with Laravel at ESPRIT 路 Sep 2023 - Nov 2023
home.exp3_description: Design, development, and integration of modules (category, sub-category, and user) using the Laravel framework.
home.exp3_skills: Skills : Full-Stack Development, GitHub, Laravel, Git, JavaScript, MySQL, CSS, PHP, HTML5, Teamwork
home.esprit: Private Higher School of Engineering and Technologies - ESPRIT
home.esprit_description: I am currently in my fifth year, specializing in Web Development as part of the Twin option at the Private Higher School of Engineering and Technologies - ESPRIT.This program aims to enhance my skills in web development, improve my understanding of programming languages, and provide practical experience in creating dynamic and responsive websites.
home.leader: Leadership Experience: During my fourth year, I had the privilege of serving as a Delegate to the Scientific Council and the Discipline Council. In this role, I actively contributed to the academic and disciplinary aspects of the institution.This experience honed my leadership and interpersonal skills, fostering a deep sense of responsibility and commitment to maintaining a positive and productive academic environment.
home.isamm: Higher Institute of Multimedia Arts of Manouba (ISAMM)
home.isamm_description_3: At the Higher Institute of Multimedia Arts of Manouba (ISAMM), specializing in Multimedia Communication, I gained skills in design, development, 3D, as well as video and audio editing. My education has equipped me with a diverse set of skills, encompassing both creative design and technical development. This includes hands-on experience in 3D modeling and proficiency in video and audio editing, reflecting a comprehensive understanding of multimedia communication.
home.high_school: Pilot High School of Arts El Omrane
home.high_school_duration: I completed my Baccalaureate in Computer Science at Pilot High School of the Arts in El Omrane Tunis. During this period, I gained a solid foundation in computer science principles and practices.

footer.aboutMeText: Passionate about creating seamless user experiences, I'm Aziz Chouchi, a Full Stack developer based in Tunisia. With a knack for problem-solving and a commitment to delivering high-quality work, I thrive on tackling complex challenges and crafting awesome interfaces with a focus on UI/UX measures.

fullStackEngineer.title: Full Stack Engineer
fullStackEngineer.description: Complete development of websites and web applications. Mastery of Front-end technologies (Angular, React.js) and Back-end technologies (Node.js, Laravel). Use of SQL (MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases. Implementation of DevOps and CI/CD concepts.

devOpsArchitect.title: DevOps Architect
devOpsArchitect.description: Design, implementation, and optimization of CI/CD pipelines. Container management with Docker. Use of tools like Jenkins, Git, Nexus. Monitoring and performance analysis with Prometheus and Grafana.

javascriptWebDeveloper.title: JavaScript Web Developer
javascriptWebDeveloper.description: Expertise in Front-end development with JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3. Use of frameworks like Angular, React.js, and Next.js. Back-end development experience with Node.js.

3DAnimationSpecialist.title: 3D and Animation Specialist
3DAnimationSpecialist.description: Creation of 3D animations with Autodesk 3ds Max. Design of 3D characters with animation skills. Experience in game development with Unity.

symfonyLaravelExpert.title: Symfony and Laravel Expert
symfonyLaravelExpert.description: Advanced development with PHP frameworks Symfony and Laravel. Construction of robust and scalable applications.

uxUiDesigner.title: UX/UI Designer
uxUiDesigner.description: Design of engaging user experiences with Adobe XD. Creation of user interfaces and graphic elements with Photoshop and Illustrator.

communityManagerBrandStrategist.title: Community Manager and Brand Strategist
communityManagerBrandStrategist.description: Animation and management of online communities. Development and implementation of brand strategies.

multimediaVersatile.title: Multimedia Versatile
multimediaVersatile.description: Advanced skills in video editing with Adobe Premiere Pro. Graphic design with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.

sqlDatabaseAnalyst.title: SQL Database Analyst
sqlDatabaseAnalyst.description: Management and analysis of SQL databases. Use of MySQL and MongoDB to store and retrieve data.

languagesAdaptability.title: Languages and Adaptability
languagesAdaptability.description: Use of English in a professional context. Ability to easily adapt to new environments and manage stress.
